about_the_game:
Poco's Magical Creature Camp

The story begins in a peaceful world reborn after its end. Poco is a human dandelion, awaken from a deep slumber by a mysterious visitor. Guided by curiosity, Poco starts a journey to connect with others and understand the world. Explore and discover a new world with Poco!

Poco's Six Emotions

Poco doesn’t yet understand how to feel deeply. By collecting "Mind Pieces," you can expand Poco's eyesight and unlock new ways of seeing the world.

Unique Camping Lifestyle

Experience a simple, raw connection to nature. Through primitive camping without high-tech gear, Poco learns to harmonize with the world and embrace life as a dialogue between the "self" and the "external world."

  • Bartering With Big Hand

Trade rare materials with the merchant Big Hand. Work together to gather what you need and thrive through mutual exchange.

  • Cooking for Survival

Gather ingredients and create meals to keep Poco energized and awake for the journey!

  • Endless Possibilities

Future updates will introduce farming, crafting, and expressive skills like playing instruments, opening up even more ways to shape Poco’s story and build a meaningful life.

name: SONIFI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Guide Poco, a magical being awakening in a peaceful world, on a heartfelt journey to explore emotions and the beauty of simple living.Experience intuitive camping, make meaningful connections, and uncover life's essentials in this enchanting adventure.
